The tweet by Roshan Lal Bittu: a national secretary of Congress student wing NSUI, claiming that the meeting between Asaduddin Owaisi and Smriti Irani was an internal meeting of the RSS Propaganda cell.
The sharing of the same photo on Faceboo: indicating that the image was circulated on social media.
The claim made by the Telangana Coordina: stating that Owaisi met Smriti Irani and asked people to vote for BJP in Lok Sabha elections.
The comparison of a different photo uplo: showing Irani and Owaisi together from a different angle, which suggests that they were taken on the same occasion.
